aguiaj.cards

Class CardHand

  • java.lang.Object
    • aguiaj.cards.CardHand

  • public class CardHand
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents card hands, composed of zero or more ordered cards.
    Author:
    Andre L. Santos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardHand()
      Constructs an empty card hand.
      CardHand(Card[] cards)
      Constructs a card hand using the cards contained in the array cards.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardHand

        public CardHand()
        Constructs an empty card hand.

      • CardHand

        public CardHand(Card[] cards)
        Constructs a card hand using the cards contained in the array cards. If the array has null elements, these are ignored.
        Parameters:
        cards - Array of cards to populate the card hand

    • Method Detail

      • random

        public static CardHand random(int numberOfCards)
        Creates a random card hand with a given cardinality. Duplicate cards may exist.
        Parameters:
        numberOfCards - Number of cards

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Is empty?
        Returns:
        true if the hand is empty, false otherwise

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Number of cards.
        Returns:
        The number of cards that compose the card hand

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Card card)
        Boolean query to check if a card exists in the card hand.
        Parameters:
        card - Card to search for
        Returns:
        true if the card hand contains the card, false otherwise

        public Card get(int index)
        Obtains a card.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the card
        Returns:
        The card at the given index

      • add

        public void add(Card card)
        Adds a card to the end of the card hand (right). Duplicates are allowed.
        Parameters:
        card - Card to be added

      • addAt

        public void addAt(Card card,
         int index)
        Adds a card at a specific index.
        Parameters:

        index - Index where to insert the card

        Obtains the index of a given card in the hand.

        Returns:
